title: plaits.m~
description: The `plaits.m~` object is a versatile polyphonic sound synthesis module, wrapping the `[plaits~]` external. It offers numerous synthesis models, including virtual analog, FM, granular, physical modeling, and speech synthesis. It supports both MIDI and signal-based control for triggering, level, and various modulations, often incorporating an internal LowPass Gate for shaping sounds.
